title: Cat Breeds
description: There are over 70 different breeds of cats, each with its own unique appearance and personality.

title: Cat Care
description: Cats are relatively low-maintenance pets, but they do require some basic care, such as food, water, shelter, and grooming.

title: Cat Health
description: Cats are generally healthy animals, but they can be susceptible to certain health problems, such as feline leukemia and feline immunodeficiency virus.

title: Cat Behavior
description: Cats are curious and intelligent creatures, and they can be very affectionate companions.

title: Cat Fun Facts
description: Did you know that cats can sleep for up to 16 hours a day? Or that they have 32 muscles in each ear?
